com.epimorphics.lda.renderers.common

Class ShortNameRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epimorphics.lda.renderers.common.ShortNameRenderer

  • public class ShortNameRenderer
extends Object
    A service object that augments the ShortnameService to add the capability of consistently generating new short names for URIs that do not yet have declared short names.
    Author:
    Ian Dickinson, Epimorphics (mailto:ian@epimorphics.com)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShortNameRenderer(ShortnameService sns, Iterable<Binding<com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource>> bindings)
      Construct a short name renderer using an existing short name service as a provider of pre-existing short names.

      • shortNameService

        public ShortnameService shortNameService(boolean required)
        Return the wrapped short name service; only throw an exception if required is true.
        Parameters:
        required - If true, wrapped service must be present
        Throws:
        EldaException

      • isDatatype

        public boolean isDatatype(String type)
        Answer true iff the named type has been declared (or is by default) to be a datatype (rather than an object type).

      • asResource

        public com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource asResource(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.RDFNode r)
        If r is a resource, answer r; if it is a literal with lexical form l, answer normaliseResource(l); otherwise throw an API exception.

      • asResource

        public com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource asResource(String s)
        Answer a resource with uri = expand(s). If there's no such expansion but s "looks like" a uri, return a resource with uri = s. Otherwise throw an API exception.

      • expand

        public String expand(String shortName)
        Return the expansion of shortName to a URI. If shortName is not a recognised short name, it is return unchanged.
        Parameters:
        shortName - The name to expand
        Returns:
        The expansion of shortName, or shortName unchanged

      • shorten

        public String shorten(String uri,
             boolean memoise)
        Return the shortened name for the given uri. If a short name exists in the wrapped short name service, use that by preference. Otherwise, compress using the usual approach, and remember the shortening locally if memoise is true.
        Parameters:
        uri - The URI to be shortened
        memoise - If true, remember any newly created short form
        Returns:
        The short form of the name

      • shorten

        public String shorten(String uri)
        Return a short name, memoising by default. See shorten(String, boolean)

      • hasShortNameService

        public boolean hasShortNameService()
        Returns:
        True if this renderer has an encapsulated short name service

      • isKnownShortnamePath

        public boolean isKnownShortnamePath(String path)
        Returns:
        True if the given string is path formed from known shortnames

      • addBindings

        protected void addBindings(Iterable<Binding<com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource>> bindings)
        Initialise the local short names map with the given bindings
        Parameters:
        bindings - An initial list of bindings, e.g. from the page object

      • addShortName

        protected void addShortName(String shortName,
                String uri)
        Add a single local binding. If already in the map, ignore it
        Parameters:
        shortName -
        uri -

      • lookupShortName

        protected String lookupShortName(String shortName)
        Look up an existing short name with no side effects. Return null if not found.
        Parameters:
        shortName - The shortname key to look up
        Returns:
        The current URI for the shortname, or null

      • lookupURI

        protected String lookupURI(String uri)
        Look to see if we have an existing short name for a given URI, or return null
        Parameters:
        uri - The URI to contract
        Returns:
        The shortname for the URI, if known, or null

      • storeShortName

        protected void storeShortName(String shortName,
                  String uri)
        Add a new shortname - URI pair

      • shortForm

        protected String shortForm(String uri)
        Return the short-form of a URI, delegating the work to Transcoding

      • prefixMapping

        protected com.hp.hpl.jena.shared.PrefixMapping prefixMapping()
        Return a prefix mapping, defaulting to the prefix mapping of the wrapped short name service. If no given prefix mapping, return an empty map.
